This document describes methods used in the paper **'Progress, challenges and opportunities for plant Red Listing'**. Each numbered section header relates to numbered sections in the manuscript. See section **'04_outputs'** for hte manuscript.

#### 1. Introduction 

```{r echo=FALSE}
# RL key needed for download. ***change this to your own key- get from iucn.org 
rlkey <- "cf3cf316d5dd72945456d42a633ac92357f6b8039bf1d512cc58e26d6169a8f3"
```

*Total number of taxa on the Red List:*
```{r}
#install.packages("rredlist")
library(rredlist)

# get total number of taxa
rredlist::rl_sp_count(key = rlkey)
```

```{r}
# note the version of the Red List
rredlist::rl_version(key = rlkey)
```
